title: A Christmas at Hotel del Coronado
description: When death visits Coronado, will secrets of the past keep them from uncovering the truth?Eleanor Wainright has been molded her whole life to fit the ideal society wife in the glittering world of New York's elite. Her father's aspirations for her are marry a man of wealth and status, and secure their family's future. But when she arrives at the Hotel Del Coronado with intents to do just that, Eleanor's carefully laid plans are thrown into disarray when she comes face to face with Thomas Harding, the man who shattered her heart and disappeared without a trace.Working as a bellboy at Californiaâ€™s newest and most prestigious resort, Thomas never imagined crossing paths with Eleanor again, let alone amidst the backdrop of a suspicious death.As secrets unravel and tensions rise, Eleanor and Thomas find themselves entangled in a perilous web of deceit and longing. With each revelation, they unearth shocking truths that jeopardize not just their own aspirations, but also the carefully constructed futures of those they hold dear.In this captivating tale of love, betrayal, and intrigue, Eleanor and Thomas must confront the past to forge a future of their own choosing.
author: Kathleen Denly
